verbs.description: [ARG1: asia argento] [V: was] [ARG2: a voice of metoo] [ARGM-TMP: now] she is accused of sexual assault what does it mean for the movement asia argento emerged as a powerful figure in the metoo movement last fall after telling the new yorker that during the cannes film festival in 1997 harvey weinstein invited her to his hotel came out in a bathrobe and sexually assaulted her now she is the subject of a criminal inquiry jimmy twitter bennett assault california marina del rey sattro weinstein tarana burke metoo asia argento cannes new york times argento hollywood
